	Project Synopsis
	IKEA (JDA Demand and Supply) :- As in Demand and supply planning(DSP) team, there is a work to support users for JDA application level issues (regarding demand,supply and fulfillment for Ikea stores), Handling oracle batches and python jobs execution issues and failures to ensure proper completion of demand and fulfillment flow on daily basis and ensure for data quality.

	Responsibilities
	· Support users for JDA demand and fulfillment application level issues.
· Handling oracle batches and python jobs.
· Finding oracle jobs performance, getting reason for execution delay, jobs cascading impacts, execution failures.
· Handling oracle jobs execution failures, fixed failures, rerunning jobs etc. 

	Database
	Oracle 12c

	Tools/OS/language
	Sql developer, toad, AIX Servers, python.



	Company
	MapmyIndia

	Project Title
	qEye/IntqEye,AOI based QA,GTA,SPI,CBDT,Qbench,Control sheet,HDF/SAP

	Period
	Feb 2017- June 2019

	Team Size
	8

	Project Description
	1. qEye/IntqEye(Quality Eye) :- It was an inhouse project, Main work in qEye/IntqEye project is to make sql scripts,pl/sql blocks & procedure according to requirement for finding errors for further removal to get error free data. There need to apply constraints, checks, business rule for data cleansing. After applying all checks, constraints required by business, release for testing and after testing completion send it for production.
Apart of that, maintaining oracle servers in term of space related issues, recreating production and testing environment in every versions, creating schemas, tablespaces, taking backups,import/exports,maintain users,tablespaces,DB permissions,space management.
2. GTA(gps track analysis) :- This was an inhouse analytical project for finding new roads, dividers, flyovers, underpass etc from our source map data of gps points by analyzing that data. Project’s all modules was on python and all major analytical operations was done on PostgreSQL spatial database(postGIS). There was major involvement in some modules like new roads finding and flyover analyzing, in which i implement some logics at postgres level by using postGIS spatial functions and implement modules in python.
3. SPI (Search Priority Index) :- An inhouse project for prioritise searching by analyzing data and applying python analytics to get data with their actual priority. I had a responsibility to migrate code from R to python.
4. CBDT :- Government project by income tax. I had a responsibility to set up postgreSQL database on their servers and populating required data into those servers and from DB servers to Elastic index for fast application response.  
5. HDF/SAP :- An inhouse project for making clients deliveries by delivery team. My role was to provide database environment like schema creation with master data loading, providing read only user to delivery team and further support in developing and modifying PL/SQL codes according to their requirements.
6. CONTROL SHEET :- A small project that assigned to create separate location to handle all information of data cleansing checks, constraints, data filtering checks and other requirements. For that i need to create Mysql server and maintain all data into separate tables according to their category and also involved in further data reporting. 

	major Technical Responsibilities
	· Making SQL scripts,PL/SQL procedures, functions,triggers according to requirement in Oracle database.
· Maintaining oracle servers,maintain users,tablespaces,DB permissions,space management,backups in Oracle database.
· Handling postgreSQL servers with tasks as user creation, DB creation, tablespace,schema creation,permissions.
· SQL, PL/SQL tasks like writing complex queries, procedures and other objects in PostgreSQL database.
· Working on oracle spatial database functions and postGIS functions.
· Working on linux servers like oracle linux, redhet linux, ubuntu.
· Making python program according to requirements in few projects.
· Worked on DB tasks on Mysql and Teradata in few projects.
· Creating windows batch files in some requirements.

	Oracle 10g/11g,12c, PostgreSQL 9.3,9.4,9.5,9.6,10, MySQL 5.7,Teradata.

	Sql Developer,sqlplus,psql,pgadmin3/4,pycharm,Sqlyog,Teradata Sql assistent, Arc Catalog, ArcGIS,Putty,Winscp, alteryx.
